p:
YOU CAN SPENDALL YOUR MONEY BEFORE YOU
START YOUR TRIP - OR YOU CAN SAVE SOME
OF YOUR CASH TO SPEND AT FORTS ALONG
THE WAY WHEN YOU RUN LOW. HOWEVER, ITEMS COST MORE AT THE FORST. YOU CAN
ALSO GO HUNTING ALONG THE WAY TO GET
MORE FOOD. WHENEVER YOU HAVE TO USE YOUR TRUSTY
RIFLE ALONG THE WAY, YOU WILL SEE THE
WORDS: 'TYPE BANG'. THE FASTER YOU TYPE
IN THE WORD 'BANG' AND HIT 'RETURN'
KEY, THEBETTER LUCK YOU'LL HAVE WITH
YOUR GUN.
WHEN ASKED TO ENTER MONEY AMOUNTS,
DON'T USE A '$'.
GOOD LUCK!!!
NEXT
